problem_text_cn: 如图,为了测量旗杆AB的高度,小凡在距旗杆底部B点10.8米的C点处放置了一面镜子,当小凡行走到与BC位于同一直线的E点处时,恰好能从镜子中观察到旗杆顶部的A点．已知小凡眼睛所在的D点离地面的高度是1.6米,CE=2.7米,则旗杆AB的高度是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in order to measure the height of the flagpole AB, Xiaofan placed a mirror at point C from the bottom of the flagpole B point N_0. When Xiaofan walks to the point E, which is in the same straight line as BC, he can observe from the mirror. Go to point A on the top of the flagpole. Knowing that the height of point D where Xiaofan's eyes are from the ground is N_1, CE = N_2, then the height of the flagpole AB is ()
raw_answer: 解:过点C作镜面的法线CH,由光学原理得∠DCH=∠ACH,∵∠DCE=90°-∠DCH,∠ACB=90°-∠ACH,∴∠DCE=∠ACB,又∵∠DEC=∠ABC=90°,∴△CDE∽△CAB,∴\frac{DE}{AB}=\frac{CE}{CB},即\frac{1.6}{AB}=\frac{2.7}{10.8},解得AB=6.4(m)．答:旗杆AB高为6.4米．故选:A．
